name: SUNCOM INFOTECH
overview:
SUNCOM INFOTECH is a IT Services and Technology Consulting company with a global presence having offices in India Middle-East and USA. We leverage on our experience in identifying business drivers and solutions that work, using latest technologies, we deliver solutions designed to maximize competitive advantage and worker productivity.

At SUNCOM we ensure that you continue to focus on your core competencies and business issues while we manage, monitor and support your technology infrastructure. Based on your business requirements, we offer various service delivery models for your business. Our team of multi-skilled professionals helps you get maximum benefit from your IT infrastructure.

IT Services provided by SUNCOM: Application Development (Web and Mobile), Re-engineering, Application & Database Migration, Enhancement and Support, e-Commerce, Internet Marketing, Website Design and Development.

SUNCOM’s proprietary products are; ERP, CMS, PMS, CRS, CRM, Web2Mobile Technology, WebSearch Tool LMS and Real Estate Management.

Understanding, formulating strategies and custom development is our core.
